sql.query:
UPDATE payments_familycharges
SET stripe_receipt_number = :P1 /* {{retrievePaymentIntent_getConfirmedDetails.charges.data[0].receipt_number}} */, stripe_receipt_url = :P2 /* {{retrievePaymentIntent_getConfirmedDetails.charges.data[0].receipt_url}} */, stripe_payment_type = :P3 /* {{retrievePaymentIntent_getConfirmedDetails.charges.data[0].payment_method_details.type}} */
WHERE uuid = :P4 /* {{exec.payment_uuid}} */
